action.msg: Damn! So, what's this? A pocket dimension?
Hehe... so you're not entirely dumb...
In here, I'm at my strongest...
And you?... You're going to become my new host...
(Shit. This place is sapping all of my strength. It's hard just to stand up.)
(This was exactly its plan... I need to think of something.)
So, you want my body, huh? Sure.
I guess I can give it up, you've seemed to have earned it. No point in struggling if I'm caught with no way out.
You've fallen into my trap. I've seperated you from the other ghosts.
And while you're super strong now, I don't sense your power rising anymore...
Which means, there's no one stopping me from beating the FUCK outta you now, IS THERE?
You're just... bluffing... I sense no strength from you whatsoever...
Fine. I'll send you to hell myself, then.
